reviewText: I have always loved Wild Kingdom and now my grandchildren are enjoying it too. They ask to see a Wild Kingdom episode every time they come to my home.
Wonderful video of different raptors. Very enjoyable.

Bought for my daughter who is an eagle/owl/hawk handler at the World Bird Sanctuary in Fenton, Missouri. I wanted her to see the programs I grew up with on television. Turns out the head of the Sanctuary here knew Marvin Perkins from the St. Louis zoo when they both were a little "younger". She absolutely LOVES this video.
